home.heroDesc: Your essential partner for quality, safety, and productivity in industrial equipment.
home.qualityDesc: Based on proven manufacturing experience, we provide quality management, OEM-responsive technology advancement, and long-term partnerships that ensure supply chain stability.
home.whyKtechDesc: Meeting the performance, durability, and safety standards required in industrial and construction equipment,
home.whyKtechDesc2: we manage the entire process from design to production and quality verification with consistent standards.
home.strength1Title: Proven Manufacturing Experience with Korea-China Production Capabilities
home.strength1Desc: With over 30 years of factory operation experience accumulated in Korea and China, we possess verified manufacturing know-how and stable supply capabilities proven in actual production sites.
home.strength2Title: Quality Management Specialized in Core Components with Reliability-Centered Structure
home.strength2Desc: In core component areas directly affecting equipment reliability - wiper motors, fuel sensors, air compressors, siren amps and lamps, wiring harnesses and cables - we ensure stability based on our own quality management system and verification processes.
home.strength3Title: Phased Technology Advancement Capabilities Responding to OEM Requirements
home.strength3Desc: Beyond simple parts supply, as a technical partner understanding equipment control structures and system integration, we progressively advance electrical and electronic component design capabilities and technology.
home.strength4Title: Long-term Partnership Approach Ensuring Supply Chain Stability
home.strength4Desc: Based on consistent quality and stable supply systems, we pursue long-term cooperative relationships rather than short-term transactions through customized technology development tailored to customers' equipment and system environments.
home.certDesc: From initial design to production, inspection, and maintenance,
home.certDesc2: KTECH operates a comprehensive quality management system based on international quality standards.
home.ctaTitle: Looking for a Partner to Grow With?
home.ctaDesc: KTECH experts will propose the optimal solution tailored to your requirements.

aboutPage.heroSubtitle: Your Partner in Industrial & Construction Machinery Core Components
aboutPage.intro1Text: , KTECH has steadily grown in the field of major component production and procurement for construction machinery and industrial vehicles, building on high trust and technical expertise.
aboutPage.intro2Text: , we have built rapid and stable raw material outsourcing capabilities and efficient production and supply systems based on our factory operation experience. These capabilities ensure stable quality while serving as a solid competitive advantage in meeting diverse customer needs.
aboutPage.intro3: We have made consistent efforts to secure more stable and sustainable
aboutPage.intro3Text: in the increasingly competitive OEM market. We deliver swift and efficient results based on decades of accumulated experience throughout the entire process of product development, design, sample production, and certification testing requested by customers.
aboutPage.commitmentText1: We continuously seek new approaches to improve quality and strengthen cost competitiveness across all production items. Through our responsible quality management system, we will grow as KTECH -
aboutPage.commitmentHighlight: a name customers trust, a partner responsible for customer supply chain stability
aboutPage.commitmentText3: We will continue to be the most trusted industrial and construction machinery parts partner with unwavering expertise.
aboutPage.qualityDesc: We provide only the highest quality products to our customers through our rigorous quality management system.
aboutPage.technologyDesc: We lead the future of industry through continuous technology development and innovation.
aboutPage.trustDesc: We keep our promises to customers and build long-term partnerships.
aboutPage.ctaDesc: We provide optimal solutions with over 30 years of experience and technical expertise.

developmentPage.heroDesc: KTECH pursues advancement in electrical and electronic component technology to respond to technological changes in the industrial and construction machinery sector, based on accumulated manufacturing experience and quality management capabilities.
developmentPage.coreCapabilitiesDesc: Manufacturing experience and quality management capabilities accumulated in core component fields for construction machinery and industrial vehicles
developmentPage.wiperDesc: High-quality wiper system design and manufacturing for construction machinery and industrial vehicles
developmentPage.airCompressorDesc: Industrial compressed air systems and related component manufacturing
developmentPage.wiringDesc: Electrical cable assembly and custom harness production
developmentPage.futureDesc: We plan to progressively strengthen our in-house design capabilities and technology advancement for electrical and electronic components, while expanding our self-certification and verification systems to maintain the stability and reliability of existing products.
developmentPage.strategyDesc: KTECH will strengthen its role as a
developmentPage.strategyDesc2: that understands equipment control structures and system integration, beyond simple parts supply.
developmentPage.strategy1Desc: Based on stable quality and consistent supply systems, we will build long-term cooperative relationships through phased technology advancement tailored to customer environments.
developmentPage.strategy2Desc: KTECH will continuously expand its technological capabilities to respond to future industrial changes while maintaining current quality.
developmentPage.closingStatement: KTECH will continue long-term growth with customers as a
developmentPage.ctaDesc: KTECH experts will propose the optimal solution tailored to your requirements.
